name: Paper Safari Papparazzi
description:
Pokemon Snap meets Paper Mario Overview 

Paper Safari is a First-person shooter where your shoots can give you photograph prizes. In this game, the player will take a tour and try to capture the essence of the animals in their natural habitat using a camera.

The tour will take you around a jungle but it is up to you to get the best picture, some animals might be camera-shy so try to be creative to get them on the frame and be quick about it. Listen carefully, animals make very particular noises, if you use that wisely you will get a great picture.

X Statement

Pokemon Snap meets Paper Mario 

Goals

The main goal in the game will be getting a great picture for the player album, which will give him more points and a great memory.

The team goal is to create a unique game and develop several meaningful skills in the process

Controls 

Controls will be quite simple: rotate with the mouse and take pictures with a button.

Audio

Audio Directions: 

We intended to make Audio part of the main mechanic, so the player has one more tool to succeed in the look for the animals. For that the specialization in sound design is key.

In the game we will have:

·        Environment(jungle) soundscape

·        Animal sound queues

·        Sound Effects to give players positive and negative feedback 

·        UI Sounds to provide feedback
